say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: Wow hey there! Been quite a long time. I think the last time I saw you, you were stealing packages off of my truck.

say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: I'm sure you are. So, what can I do for ya?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: Well, I'm trying to figure out where I can find Kate, and I was thinking maybe you had her new address.

say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: Yeah... I dunno. What makes you think she'd even want to see you?

say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: Oh gosh I'm sorry... Look. I AM the postman, so I do hear stuff here and there. Maybe if you help me. I can help you.

say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: well, I'm kinda behind schedule with my packages. Maybe you could deliver some for me?

say.name: POSTMAN:
say.says: Great! Here's the packages, Just put them in the mailboxes around town and come back.
